select
count(distinct a.paper_id) as publication_count
distinct a.paper_id, a.pmid,a.journal,a.title,a.author,a.pub_year, (select common_name from organism where organism.org_id=b.org_id) as common_name
from publication a inner join gwas_association b on a.paper_id=b.paper_id inner join genotype_annotate_gene d on d.genotype_id=b.genotype_id where d.g_id=#{gId}
